original: Molt, Ture Johan, häradshövding, Kungsbacka, f. 9/6/90 à Löderup, Krist. Il g. 25 im. Aina BslkiefJunid. Barn: Eilii-sabtet f. 26, Chnistlian 28. Fredrik 39. — St’ud :ex. ii Ystad 10, jur. ikamd. li Lund 16. Tf. dcimhav. und’. Sk. ho’vr. tidiv. 17-29, t!f. fiilsikiail! d Sk. hovr. 19-21, adjung. Ikd. 25-26, v. här :hö’vd. 21, bdtr. domare i Väsitra GöiLnge 25, tf. rev :S’ekr. 29, här :ihövdl i Haljl’. norra doms. fr. 31. Ordf. i styr. f. samrealsk. RNO 37.
translated: Molt, Ture Johan, district judge, Kungsbacka, b. 9/6/90 in Löderup, Krist. Married on 25th June to Aina Bjelkefjord. Children: Eilii-sabtet b. 26, Christian b. 28, Fredrik b. 39. Education: Law degree in Ystad 10, studied law in Lund 16. Temporary judge at Skåne Court of Appeals 17-29, acting district judge at Skåne Court of Appeals 19-21, assistant judge 25-26, vice district judge 21, deputy judge in Västra Göinge 25, acting secretary in the Revenue Department 29, district judge in Norra Halland from 31. Chairman of the board for secondary school. Awarded the Royal Order of the Polar Star in 1937 (RNO 37).

memberOf.name: Chairman of the board for secondary school

awards.name: Royal Order of the Polar Star
